ModMetaData.name: MineralsExtra_SK
ModMetaData.author: Zachary Foster
ModMetaData.description:
For RimWorld Hardcore SK v1
mod version 1.1.0
<size=24>Description</size>
Must come after Minerals_SK in the loading order.
This mod is an expansion of the "Minerals_SK" Mod that adds more mineral diversity.
See: https://github.com/zachary-foster/MineralsExtra_SK for detailed documentation.
